title: File upload and download
breadcrumbs: Version 2.1 New features, improvements and updates
text:
File upload and download

File up and download was supported in previous version of the framework, but as these operations are common but complex, weâ€™ve extended the base functionality and improved the available documentation so it becomes substantially easier to offer both File up- as well as download in devonfw based applications. See: devonfw Guide Cookbook: File Upload and Download
